## Importa Chla

```{r importaChla}
source("R/functions.r")
require(lubridate)
require(ggplot2)
require(tidyr)

chla <- read.delim("Data/Clorofila.txt", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

fixedChla <- fixChlorophyllData(chla)


range(fixedChla$IntegE1, na.rn=TRUE)

ggplot(fixedChla, aes(Date, IntegE1)) + geom_point()

ggplot(fixedChla, aes(Date, IntegE1)) + geom_point(color="blue") + scale_y_log10()

ggplot(fixedChla, aes(Date, IntegE2)) + geom_point(color="red") + scale_y_log10()

ggplot(fixedChla, aes(Date, IntegE2)) + geom_point(color="red") + scale_y_log10() + theme_bw()

ChlaRerranged <- gather(fixedChla, IntegE1, IntegE2, key="Station", value="ChlaInteg")

ggplot(ChlaRerranged, aes(Date, ChlaInteg, color=Station)) + geom_point() + scale_y_log10() + theme_bw()

#str(fixedChla)

```
